page.title: 10BALQUHIDDER CHURCH & GROUNDS
page.content: In the graveyard many visitors come to see Rob Roy's grave. It is placed at the door of the ruined church. Rob Roy is buried with his wife and two sons. Balquhidder Church is small and seats only 400 people. The old ruined church was once called "Eaglais Beag" or little church. The new church was built by David Carnegie of Stronvar and was opened in 1855. The old church was built in 1631 and has been partly built over the top of the Pre-reformation church. In the summer we have many buses full of tourists. Some buses come from all over the world just to see Rob Roy's grave. The parish is the traditional home of the clan McLaren Ferguson, Macgregor and Stewart of Glenbuckie.
